body_html:
My problem lies with old GLIBC version(2.11.3), and I tried installing bazel for which it requires a GLIBC version 2.14 or greater.

Any other solution?
Note: I can't update GLIBC version, because I am using a cluster system and naturally am not given a admin privileges.

body:
My problem lies with old GLIBC version(2.11.3), and I tried installing bazel for which it requires a GLIBC version 2.14 or greater.

Any other solution?
